duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct comprehensive evaluations of foot and ankle conditions, and create tailored treatment plans for patients.
Perform surgical procedures as necessary, including foot and ankle reconstructions, and prescribe medications and orthotics to manage pain and promote healing.
Educate patients on proper foot care techniques and preventive measures.
Utilize Figma to create wireframes and prototypes for innovative podiatric solutions.
Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams to deliver holistic patient care and maintain accurate and detailed patient records.

education_certification.credential: Doctor of Podiatric Medicine (DPM) degree from an accredited college of podiatric medicine.
